message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll love it!

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to pay that price, and I think it's a fair deal considering the product's value to me is lower than what you mentioned.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll love it!

I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $12500. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $13250. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $15000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to sell it to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
